system.effect: Double Base travel time through the warp (may be further modified by results of Navigation (Warp) Test). Add additional +20 Bonus to Assessing Warp Conditions and any Warp Travel Encounter Tests. +10 to tests made by the Navigator to fix the vessel's exit point from the warp.

description.value: Double Base travel time through the warp (may be further modified by results of Navigation (Warp) Test). Add additional +20 Bonus to Assessing Warp Conditions and any Warp Travel Encounter Tests. +10 to tests made by the Navigator to fix the vessel's exit point from the warp.
